summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to the City Light Department accepting electrical underground and surface rights distribution easements over portions of Lot 28, Block 1, Homewood Park; Lot 4, Block 14 of Ballard Tide Lands; Lots 1 and 3, King County Short Plat No. S89SO432 (revised), recorded under Recording Number 9208189006; Lot 8, Block 3, Adams Home Tracts; Parcel A of Short Plat No. 8801913, recorded under King County Recording No. 8903090265; Lots 6, 7, 8 and 9, Block 12, Lago Vista; The Bayshore West, according to Condominium Declaration recorded under King County Recording No. 8607230602 and 8702191456; Lot 5, Block 14 of Ballard Tide Lands and Reserve No. 4 of Brygger's Second Home Addition to the City of Ballard; and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
